DOC.brief_summary: Genetic studies of coronary artery disease, restenosis after angioplasty or stenting, focusing on renin-angiotensin system genes and adiponectin gene, and their interactions.
DOC.brief_title: Adiponectin Gene and Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.criteria: Patients receiving angiography Patients receiving angioplasty and reluctant for the study
